title: Watch How Rajkumar Rao Ended Up Selling A 'Made In China' Pen To Leonardo DiCaprio
text:
The versatile actor Rajkumar Rao will be next seen in his movie Made in China, where he plays a Gujarati businessman. Taking the marketing and promotional skills to another level, and prove his business acumen, he just sold a pen to Leonardo DiCaprio.

How? Let us tell you.

Well Rajkumar Rao did not actually meet the Oscar winning actor. He just very smartly edited a scene of the very famous movie The Wolf of Wall Street.

In the scene DiCaprio walks up to a man and challenges him to sell a pen. The man fumbles and fails miserably at the job. Then we see Leo approaching the next man, who in the viral video edited by Rao is his character from Made in China. He says, "Leo Bhai Kem Cho! Arre Leo Bhai this pen is your story but the refill is the hero. So sell hero (sic).”

The video ends with another edited insertion from the movie where Leonardo DiCaprio is clapping his hands in appreciation.
